snippet.title: Ghost Song Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2022
snippet.description:
Prepare for a science-fiction journey of self-discovery, ancient mysteries, and cosmic terror—Ghost Song arrives November 3 on PC, Xbox One, PS4, PS5, and Nintendo Switch!

#IGN #GhostSong
